name: Ecofin
overview: Founded in 1991, Ecofin is a business and investment consulting firm focused on the utility and infrastructure industries. The company gives advice to institutional and corporate clients on anything from mergers and acquisitions to risk management and financial planning. Ecofin offers four global utilities funds that invest in equity and equity-related securities of utility companies: Ecofin Water & Power Opportunities plc (listed on the London Stock Exchange); Ecofin Global Utilities Hedge Fund Limited and Ecofin North American Utilities Master Fund (both are Cayman Islands hedge funds listed on the Irish Stock Exchange); and Ecofin Special Situations Utilities Master Fund (Cayman Islands hedge fund).
